short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to help simulate a dark theme for NY times connections

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you your eyes needs some minimal comfort while doing your daily connections, then this extension is for you - it switches the games color scheme into forced "Dark mode". Its not perfect, but just might be good enough.
